    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1177</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Milchemet Hamelachim3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Milchemet Hamelachim3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Milchemet Hamelachim3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Milchemet Hamelachim3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Milchemet Hamelachim3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Milchemet Hamelachim3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Milchemet Hamelachim3</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Four-lesson unit on Bereshit 14: 1-24. learners participate in multiple intelligences exercises in order to understand the battle of the kings. Includes worksheets.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bereshit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">avram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bible</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">battle of kings</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vier-Lektion Maßeinheit auf Bereshit 14: 
1-24. nehmen Anfänger an den mehrfachen Intelligenzübungen 
teil, um die Schlacht der Könige zu verstehen. Enthält Bogen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité de Quatre-leçon sur Bereshit 14 : 
1-24. les étudiants participent aux exercices multiples 
d'intelligences afin de comprendre la bataille des rois. Inclut 
des tableaux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade da Quatro-lição em Bereshit 14: 
1-24. os learners participam em exercícios múltiplos das 
inteligências a fim compreender a batalha dos reis. Inclui 
folhas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità di Quattro-lezione su Bereshit 14: 
1-24. i principianti partecipano alle esercitazioni multiple di 
intelligenze per capire la battaglia dei re. Include i fogli di 
lavoro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μονάδα τέσσερις-μαθήματος σε Bereshit 14: 1-24. οι αρχάριοι συμμετέχουν στις πολλαπλάσιες ασκήσεις 
intelligences προκειμένου να γίνει κατανοητή η μάχη των 
βασιλιάδων. Περιλαμβάνει τα φύλλα εργασίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">unidad de la Cuatro-leccio'n en Bereshit 14: 
1-24. los principiantes participan en ejercicios múltiples de 
las inteligencias para entender la batalla de los reyes. Incluye
las hojas de trabajo.</string>
          </description>
